Package main

Class Market

java.lang.Object
main.Market
public class Market extends Object
Generates and stores Athletes and Items available for sale to the Player. The player can also sell athletes and items back to the Market. This class is also used to help create the player's Team during setup.
Version:
1.09
Author:
mdi48, bsm62

  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market()
      Constructor for the class. Initializes the market and creates a reference list of available Items, as well as creating a current stock of items and Athletes.

  • Method Details

    • stockItems

      public static void stockItems()
      Clears the markets' list of Items and generates a new list. A random number from 0 to 5 of each item in the reference list is added.

    • stockAthletes

      public static void stockAthletes()
      Clears the markets' list of Athletes and generates a new list. A random number from 3 to 5 athletes are randomly generated.

    • athleteBuyBack

      public static void athleteBuyBack()
      Calls toggleBuyBack() method for all Athletes in the markets' stock and Player inventory. This allows athletes to be sold back to the Market for the same price they were bought for, allowing easier Team creation during setup.

    • buyItem

      public static void buyItem(Item item)
      Buys the specified Item, reducing its' store quantity and increasing its' Player quantity. If the items' player quantity was previously zero, adds the item to the players' list of items. If the items' store quantity is now zero, removes the item from the Markets' list of items.
      Parameters:
      item - the item being bought

    • sellItem

      public static void sellItem(Item item)
      Sells the specified Item, reducing its' Player quantity and increasing its' store quantity. If the items' store quantity was previously zero, adds the item to the Markets' list of items. If the items' player quantity is now zero, removes the item from the players' list of items.
      Parameters:
      item - the item being sold

    • buyAthlete

      public static void buyAthlete(AthletePanel panel, Athlete athlete)
      Buys the specified Athlete. Removes the athlete from the Markets's list of athletes and adds it to the Players's Team.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete being bought

    • sellAthlete

      public static void sellAthlete(AthletePanel panel, Athlete athlete)
      Sells the specified Athlete. Removes the athlete from the Players' Team and adds it to the Markets's list of athletes.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete being sold

    • getItems

      public static ArrayList<Item> getItems()

    • getAthletes

      public static ArrayList<Athlete> getAthletes()
